# sourceTrackIDForFrameTiming

**Instance Property**

An identifier of the source track from which the video composition derives frame timing.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceTrackIDForFrameTiming: CMPersistentTrackID { get }
```

## Discussion

If an empty edit is encountered in the source asset’s track, the compositor composes frames as needed up to the frequency specified in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/frameDuration] property. Otherwise the frame timing for the video composition is derived from the source asset’s track with the corresponding ID.

## Identifying source tracks

- **sourceSampleDataTrackIDs**: The identifiers of source sample data tracks in the composition that the object requires to compose frames.
